prompts.title: City sunset
prompts.prompt:
Ultra-realistic urban portrait of me standing with my back gently resting against a mirrored glass building facade. Body positioned in side profile, head turned toward the camera with a confident, calm expression. Legs slightly crossed, both hands in pockets. A red Ferrari is parked on the perpendicular street beside me, with its front facing the camera, clearly visible in the composition. Outfit: black tailored suit, white shirt, and Adidas sneakers completely white, including the stripes. The glass reflection is soft and slightly diffused, subtly blurred for realism. Scene captured during golden hour, with warm sunlight casting golden highlights on the buildings, car, and reflection. Long soft shadows, cinematic warm tones, glowing light contours. Add subtle natural glow on both the car and me, caused by the sun rays, enhancing the highlights and warmth. Ultra-detailed 8K realism, lifelike skin tones, realistic fabric texture, and professional editorial look. Keep 100% of the uploaded face, no changes to facial features or identity.

prompts.title: Emotional close-up
prompts.prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the primary reference.
Keep the exact facial structure, skin texture, and natural hair color and hair texture exactly as in the uploaded photo (no changes to face anatomy or hair tone).
Close-up hyperrealistic portrait with soft contrast and rich grayscale depth.
Head is slightly tilted to the left and slightly upward, maintaining elegance.
Eyes are half-open, looking directly at the camera with a subtle sad and quietly hopeless emotional expression.
The overall emotion should feel gentle, tired, introspective, not dramatic or exaggerated.
Hair is messy and intentionally disordered, with strands falling freely from both sides and across the face, softly covering parts of the forehead, cheeks, and near the eyes.
The hair should appear natural, soft, and detailed, emphasizing vulnerability.
Lighting is soft and directional, highlighting the upper cheeks and forehead, with gentle shadows shaping the lower face for emotional depth.
Background remains very soft bokeh, keeping full attention on the expression and emotional tone.
Mood: quiet sadness, emotional vulnerability, intimate atmosphere, delicate realism.
Hyperreal detail, natural texture, raw authenticity.
-ar 2:3 style raw

prompts.title: Rock-n-roll spirit
prompts.prompt:
Generate a hyper-realistic artistic fashion portrait: a young woman in a cinematic 1970s rock’n’roll style.
The model’s face, facial structure, eye shape, eyebrows, nose, lips, and hairstyle must exactly match the uploaded photo — no changes or distortions.
Hair color and hairstyle remain the same as in the uploaded image.
She is slightly turned toward the camera, looking just past it (three-quarter profile), creating a strong yet natural composition.
She wears oversized square tortoiseshell sunglasses with warm reflections, gold chunky hoop earrings, and a thick gold chain necklace.
Outfit: white ribbed tank top with thin straps, light blue distressed denim jacket casually falling off the shoulders.
Lighting: dramatic backlight forming a warm orange-red halo glow around her silhouette; soft side light on the face to highlight skin texture and shine.
Mood & style: cinematic 70s editorial vibe, confident and stylish, evoking the essence of classic rock-fashion energy — warmth, grain, glow, and attitude.
Color palette: burnt orange, deep brown, honey gold, and soft denim blue tones.
Ultra-high-resolution, shallow depth of field, photorealistic rendering.

prompts.title: Cinematic closeup portrait
prompts.prompt:
Keep the exact face from the reference image with no changes to facial structure, bone structure, skin tone, or proportions. Do not alter the identity.
Ultra-detailed black and white close-up fashion portrait of a woman. Strong emphasis on light and shadow contrast, sharp focus on the eyes and lips. Slightly softer focus on the hat and background. The composition is tightly framed, showing only part of the face and upper clothing to create a mysterious and dramatic mood.
Headwear: A dark, wide-brim hat with a textured, knitted or woven appearance. The brim falls diagonally, casting a shadow that partially covers the forehead and the left eye (in frame).
Neck and lower face covering: A dark, high collar or fabric (scarf, turtleneck, or wrap) covering the neck and lower jaw, rising up to just under the lips, creating strong contrast with skin tone.
Facial details:
• One visible eye, looking directly at the camera, defined with dark eyeliner and
mascara.
• Eyebrows neat and naturally full.
• • Nose slim and smooth.
• Lips full and slightly glossy, sharply defined.
• Skin smooth, clean, and evenly lit with high contrast shadows enhancing depth.
Lighting: Hard, directional lighting that creates bold, sculpted shadows under the hat brim and around the face, emphasizing mystery and elegance.
Mood / Style: High-fashion editorial portrait, cinematic glamour, elegant, confident, mysterious, refined presence.
Render style: Hyper-realistic, high-resolution, fine texture detail, soft film grain, strong contrast monotone black and white.

prompts.title: Roadside Diner Portraid
prompts.prompt:
Hyper-realistic close-up portrait of a man, looking fit at 92 kg with the physique of someone who trains 2-3 times a week at the gym.
Keep his exact facial features and hair from the reference, no changes.
He sits in a warm, dimly lit roadside diner or a cozy, rustic bar that might be a common stop on a long journey, evoking the "Highway Echoes" vibe. He wears a comfortable, slightly worn leather jacket over a dark t-shirt, appropriate for a traveler.
Natural relaxed pose: hands resting on the table, not touching the face.
Framing: shoulder up close portrait, centered, looking directly into the camera.
On the wooden table in front of him:
​a sturdy, well-used ceramic mug with coffee, showing subtle steam.
​a vintage map or a classic car magazine placed casually beside it.
Lighting: warm, ambient lighting from the diner/bar, with soft shadows that emphasize his features and physique. Realistic texture - visible subtle muscle definition, natural skin details, and a hint of a traveler's ruggedness.
Background softly blurred but still recognizable as a classic roadside diner interior or a rustic bar, with hints of neon signs or vintage decor in the distance.
Slight cinematic grain to keep the candid, authentic atmosphere of a quiet moment on a journey.
Mood: calm, introspective, authentic, with a touch of a road-weary but content traveler.
Style: ultra-sharp 8K, natural appearance (no exaggerated makeup), no fantasy effects, no blur on the face, wearing stylish but practical sunglasses, with an amazing pose and professional.
